ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 726 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 673 - 783 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.0 °C, dissolved oxygen 5.7 mg/l, hardness 45.0 mg/l CaCO3, alkalinity 51.3 mg/l CaCO3, and pH 7.58.

EC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 726 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 673 - 783 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.0 °C, dissolved oxygen 5.7 mg/l, hardness 45.0 mg/l CaCO3, alkalinity 51.3 mg/l CaCO3, and pH 7.58. Effect: loss of equilibrium.
